jdbc.query

Class EmployeeQueries

  • java.lang.Object
    • jdbc.query.EmployeeQueries

  • public class EmployeeQueries
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for executing queries related to employees and guides in the system. It handles operations such as searching for approved employees, checking visitor order statuses, updating guide statuses, and retrieving lists of guides with specific statuses.
    Author:
    Tamer Amer, Gal Bitton, Rabea Lahham, Bahaldeen Swied, Ron Sisso, Nadav Reubens.

      Constructor and Description
      EmployeeQueries()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerResponse checkIfVisitorPaidAndConfirmed(int orderId)
      Checks if a visitor's order is paid and confirmed.
      ServerResponse searchForApprovedEmployee(Employee employee)
      Searches for an employee by username and verifies their credentials.
      ServerResponse ShowAllGuidesWithPendingStatus(java.util.ArrayList<Guide> guideList)
      Retrieves all guides with a status of 'Pending' and adds them to the provided list.
      ServerResponse UpdateGuideStatusToApprove(Guide guide)
      Updates the status of a guide from pending to approved.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EmployeeQueries

        public EmployeeQueries()

    • Method Detail

      • searchForApprovedEmployee

        public ServerResponse searchForApprovedEmployee(Employee employee)
        Searches for an employee by username and verifies their credentials. It updates the provided Employee object with additional details if the employee exists and is approved.
        Parameters:
        employee - An Employee object containing the username and password to be verified.
        Returns:
        A ServerResponse indicating the outcome of the search and verification process.

      • checkIfVisitorPaidAndConfirmed

        public ServerResponse checkIfVisitorPaidAndConfirmed(int orderId)
        Checks if a visitor's order is paid and confirmed.
        Parameters:
        orderId - The ID of the order to check.
        Returns:
        A ServerResponse indicating whether the order is paid and confirmed, not paid, not confirmed, or if the order was not found.

      • UpdateGuideStatusToApprove

        public ServerResponse UpdateGuideStatusToApprove(Guide guide)
        Updates the status of a guide from pending to approved.
        Parameters:
        guide - A Guide object containing the ID of the guide to be approved.
        Returns:
        A ServerResponse indicating whether the guide's status was successfully updated to approved or if the operation failed.

      • ShowAllGuidesWithPendingStatus

        public ServerResponse ShowAllGuidesWithPendingStatus(java.util.ArrayList<Guide> guideList)
        Retrieves all guides with a status of 'Pending' and adds them to the provided list.
        Parameters:
        guideList - An ArrayList of Guide objects to be populated with the retrieved guides.
        Returns:
        A ServerResponse indicating whether guides with a pending status were found and added to the list.
